# This executes only in Windows
IF (NV_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR STREQUAL "AMD64")
  SET(GNUWIN32_BIN_PREFIX "bin64")
ELSE(NV_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR STREQUAL "AMD64")
  SET(GNUWIN32_BIN_PREFIX "bin")
ENDIF(NV_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR STREQUAL "AMD64")

INSTALL(PROGRAMS 
	${GNUWIN32_BIN_PREFIX}/jpeg62.dll
	${GNUWIN32_BIN_PREFIX}/libpng12.dll
	${GNUWIN32_BIN_PREFIX}/libtiff3.dll
	${GNUWIN32_BIN_PREFIX}/zlib1.dll
	DESTINATION bin)
